website_summaries.verdict: A dual-action shampoo that balances the effects of shampoo and conditioner well.
pros: Easy to apply while saving time using a single product
cons: Some bottles contain more conditioner than shampoo

customer_reviews.title: Huge bottles!!!
customer_reviews.text: Been having a hard time finding this scent of shampoo at my local store. It has a very nice aroma that is not so overpowering as some scented shampoos. I didn't realize that each of the bottles would be more than twice the size of what I usually get. But the makes the value even better. It's not like it's going to spoil. I just won't need to reorder for quite some time.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew P. Bartmess

customer_reviews.title: Is it real?
customer_reviews.text: Labeling and smell doesn’t seem right. I’m not 100% sure it’s an authentic Old Spice product.
customer_reviews.author: Brad

customer_reviews.title: very nice scent
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my husband for Christmas last year. it has a great scent and I will get it again if it runs out. he always smells so good when he gets out of the shower. I like this brand in particular, it is easy to find almost anywhere. the price was a plus from amazon.
customer_reviews.author: beth

customer_reviews.title: Good for washing cats maybe?
customer_reviews.text: I guess if you like Suave etc., you'll like this. Weak scent that faded very quickly. It's cheap, I guess I'm not.
customer_reviews.author: Garry C. Burgess

customer_reviews.title: I don’t smell
customer_reviews.text: I’m only writing here because it’s making me to give it any stars.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathon

customer_reviews.title: Not as advertised
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this Old Spice Shampoo & Conditioner Pack expecting to receive what is being advertised. I unfortunately received Old Spice Fiji (w/Coconut) which is not what shown or mentioned.
customer_reviews.author: Angel

customer_reviews.title: Good scent
customer_reviews.text: 2 in one makes it handy to use. Works great.
customer_reviews.author: Francis C. Beakes

customer_reviews.title: Good soap
customer_reviews.text: Does what it needs to. Its soap. It wont make you breakfast in the morning, but the ho you got with this soap better.
customer_reviews.author: vincent

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic smell
customer_reviews.text: A step up from the ol axe. Priced properly as well. Figured it was time to do away with axe because of the pricing issues I have seen in a store picture. Specifics include Walmart pricing “axe Phoenix” at 1.74/oz for a 24 oz bottle with a resale of 6.97. Much happier with a basic product that is simple affordable and protective of my hair.
customer_reviews.author: Evan Peterson

customer_reviews.title: Nice Scent, Convenient
customer_reviews.text: My whole family loves this shampoo/conditioner. The bottle is a good size and the scent is nice. It is not too heavy. When in use, it is a nice scent, and it leaves just a little behind so hair smells clean but is not overwhelming. The kids love that they can use one product instead of two for cleaning their hair and keeping it soft. In a pinch it can also be used as a body wash. With both the kids approval and that of my husband, I feel great about getting this again, especially since I enjoy the scent as well.
customer_reviews.author: Wendi Barker

customer_reviews.title: Great value for the money! Smells amazing!
customer_reviews.text: MAN OH MAN! This smells AMAZING! my son and husband are going to LOVE this! The bottles are alot larger than expected and will last a month or so for each bottle. The smell brings me back to my childhood, remembering my grandfather's after-shave . The smell is a twist on the original old spice smell and a beach/tropical smell. The smell is quite intoxicating.
customer_reviews.author: Kay

customer_reviews.title: Smells Great
customer_reviews.text: This smells delicious. Slightly tropical, but with enough Old Spice mixed in to keep it manly. But not grandpop manly. Just enough manly that you don't smell like a teenager doused in Axe. My husband uses this everyday, in combination with their Fiji antiperspirant/deodorant, and the ladies at daycare always comment about how nice he smells.
customer_reviews.author: SJU82

customer_reviews.title: Smells good
customer_reviews.text: I normally buy my husband the Dove men's shampoo/conditioner in one but thought I'd give this one a try. When it arrived, he was hesitant and complaining because he is loyal to certain products. Once he used it, he said he really liked it. It smells good but isn't too strong like some of the other men's products available on the market that knock you off your feet with the scent. Overall, he was happy with the product.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Great Shampoo for the boys!
customer_reviews.text: I've had a hard time finding this product in the stores and was thankfully able to get it here on amazon! My son loves this shampoo. It smells good, leaves his hair feeling soft and clean, and doesn't add a lot of buildup in his hair. I'm glad I found it here! It's priced well for a two pack and you get a lot for the price!
customer_reviews.author: Elle G. Reads

customer_reviews.title: Huge bottles - Great Value !!
customer_reviews.text: These smell so good!! But I don't know if I've ever not enjoyed the smell of some Old Spice. As my headline states these bottles are a large size. My hubby is set for months with this two pack.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha

customer_reviews.title: OK
customer_reviews.text: This works well enough. I don't think my hair felt particularly clean or soft. But I was able to style well enough and it didn't feel greasy.
customer_reviews.author: AshertopiA

customer_reviews.title: Works well...
customer_reviews.text: This 2 in 1 works well. It leaves my hair clean and manageable. It smells like the deodorant of the same name. So if you like that you'll like this. Overall I'd recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Schwartz

customer_reviews.title: Great 2 in 1
customer_reviews.text: My husband is a Pert Plus loyal but he is pretty happy using this instead. Lasts for quite a while. Good smell and not overwhelming.
customer_reviews.author: Carma Rey Klaja

customer_reviews.title: good shampoo
customer_reviews.text: smells good, seems to have a new formulation that's fairly potent--or maybe it's just the redesigned bottles. but it's nice overall.
customer_reviews.author: SR

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: Affordably priced shampoo that is popular with both of my sons. It also smells great and leaves your hair feeling soft and smooth.
customer_reviews.author: Karen

customer_reviews.title: Go around smelling like a coconut.
customer_reviews.text: If you want your heard to smell like a coconut then this is for you! This shampoo does smell great and works great too.
customer_reviews.author: Allen Chapman

customer_reviews.title: Good shampoo with pleasant aroma
customer_reviews.text: The shampoo did the job of getting my hair clean, has a pleasant but not overwhelming aroma.
customer_reviews.author: Stepinwolf

customer_reviews.title: Great price and does the job.
customer_reviews.text: I typically use separate shampoo and conditioner but decided to give this 2 in 1 combo a try. I have used it a few times and so far I haven't noticed any issues with it drying out my scalp or leaving my hair dry. I'm still not sure whether I like the scent but the again, I'm extremely picky with perfumes, colognes and fragrances. The scent is mild so It isn't overpowering which for me is a good thing. Not certain that I would purchase it again but not because of the quality so much as I still prefer the separate shampoo and conditioner experience.
customer_reviews.author: Joe Myers

customer_reviews.title: 2-1 Shampoo and Conditioner has a great sent, nice lather
customer_reviews.text: This has a great man sent, both my husband and son gave it a thumbs up. I did give it a try as well and I thought it was a great shampoo. I personally (as does my husband) still use a conditioner even though it says 2 and 1 (Shampoo and Conditioner) because we both still want to feel the softness from the conditioner which we typically do not get with any 2 in 1 that we have ever tried. This has a nice lather to it and a sent that last a good part of the day. This one is a winner in our household.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: Great Deal, Pleasant Scent
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this for my husband and he loves it. He's been using Old Spice Original deodorant for 15 years so I wasn't sure what he'd think of this scent. It's a lot more mild which we both enjoy. It seems to cleanse and condition most mens hair rather well, having used it for my husband and our kids (but will not provide enough conditioning/detangling for long hair). The bottles are large and considering you get 2 of them, the price is fair and I would definitely recommend the product.
customer_reviews.author: PNWfam385

customer_reviews.title: Smells Incredible!
customer_reviews.text: This could definitely be used by men or women. It's got that classic Old Spice scent with a tropical touch. It smells so clean and refreshing. It works great on any hair type, I was relieved to discover that it doesn't weigh fine hair down. The scent isn't overwhelming and lasts all day. I'm extremely happy with the results and can't get enough of the smell.
customer_reviews.author: OverIt

customer_reviews.title: It works and leaves your hair soft and manageable
customer_reviews.text: I am not normally a fan of 2-in-1 shampoos. I have very fine hair and most of the time they leave my hair limp and lifeless. I tried this shampoo this morning and it was very nice. Just the right combination of cleaning and conditioning with a mild pleasant scent. My hair combed out easily and was not limp. Will buy again...
customer_reviews.author: dc-in-md

customer_reviews.title: Old spice makes a good mens shampoo combo
customer_reviews.text: I like that my man can use an all in one shampoo and conditioner. I got him this and he's quite happy with it. It works great and keeps him clean. Fiji however is not my favorite scent on him... I much prefer the one named "Swagger" which seems to have less of an allergen affect on me.
customer_reviews.author: Ravenskya

customer_reviews.title: Smells great; washes well
customer_reviews.text: I really like how this smells and how it feels on my hair. Does a great job making it feel clean and soft without having to wash and rinse multiple times.
customer_reviews.author: Brian R.

customer_reviews.title: Happy to use it!
customer_reviews.text: Well, I laugh as I write this. It's a shampoo. My hair didn't fall out, and no bees or flies followed me. There is only a slight residual scent (nice). My hair isn't really long enough to need a conditioner for tangles. Happy to use it!
customer_reviews.author: R S Cobblestone

customer_reviews.title: My grandfather loves this!
customer_reviews.text: My grandfather usually wears the deodorant so I decided to get him this shampoo/conditioner... He is so cute, he now washes his hair daily lol.
customer_reviews.author: Los Kositos

customer_reviews.title: My husband looks like Santa Claus and smells like Old Spice!
customer_reviews.text: Can I help it if I'm just lucky? We've never tried an Old Spice product that we didn't love, and this one is no exception. It cleans nicely and smells great -- as fresh as the North Pole! LOL!! Love it, really.
customer_reviews.author: J. Arena

customer_reviews.title: beach in your bathroom
customer_reviews.text: It smells tropical, like fruit and fresh scent. It has a good lather and gets your hair nice and clean smelling while leaving it soft and tangle free.
customer_reviews.author: Katherinegoodman

customer_reviews.title: Very good
customer_reviews.text: Good value on a 2 and 1. Nice manly smell, but not too overpowering. I'll keep on eat home and the other at the cabin. Wife likes the smell.
customer_reviews.author: Bunson Honeydew
